categories: Category:Grand Army of the Republic units

nodes.text: During the Clone Wars, a clone trooper unit was active and was led by Jedi General Mace Windu. It participated in the Battle of Anaxes alongside the 7th Sky Corps and the 501st Legion. Initially during the battle, the unit fought against Separatist Alliance ground forces with the support of All Terrain Tactical Enforcers, and later attacked the Anaxes shipyards after the Republic mission to Skako Minor in a final assault to attempt to turn the tide of the battle.
The engagement was successful, and the army of Separatist Admiral Trench was defeated. The unit was equipped with standard Phase II clone trooper armor with maroon markings.
